title: Deal of the Week: Python Programming Pro Bundle (84% off)
text:
Deal of the Week: Python Programming Pro Bundle (84% off) By Martin Brinkmann on October 12, 2015 in Deals - Last Update: October 12, 2015 0 
Python is a widely-used programming language. The deal of the week brings you a six course series that has something in it for everyone. 
Beginners can check out the Python Programming for Beginners course which acts as a solid foundation for some of the other courses such as Python Web Programming. 
There is one course in there that walks you through the creation of a Flappy Bird clone in Python, one that teaches you Django from scratch, and two that teach you data analysis and data visualitation using Python. The six courses included in the deal are: Data Analysis With Python and Pandas Learn Python Django From Scratch Python Web Programming Data Visualization with Python and Matplotlib Python Programming for Beginners Python Game Development - Create a Flappy Bird Clone The deals' page on Ghacks Deals provides you with detailed information about each course including core concepts that you will learn in it, the number of lessons and hours of contents it provides you with. A click on instruction and a click through to the linked website provides additional information and a short video sample of what you can expect in each course. Make sure you check out the Ghacks Deals frontpage for other e-learning, software or gadget offers, as well as freebies and giveaways.
